import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; import Logo from "../images/noMoreWasteLogo.svg"; import axios from "axios"; const Signup = () => { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ businessname: "", address: "", username: "", phone_number: "", email: "", password: "", }) const [err,setError] = useState(null) const handleChange = e =>{ setInputs(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})); }; const handleSubmit = async e =>{ e.preventDefault() try{ const res = await axios.post("http://", inputs) console.log(res) } catch(err){ setError(err.response.data); //console.log(res) } } return (

); }; export default Signup;
